pages.text: A mystical key that can be bound to a blood mage's soul. Used as a crafting component in various Animus recipes and can be equipped as a curio for passive effects.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Binding:$() Right-click while holding to bind to your soul network$(br2)$(bold)Curio Slot:$() Can be equipped in the "key" curio slot$(br2)$(bold)Crafting:$() Used in recipes requiring player binding$(br2)$(italic)The key to unlocking your potential.$()
